subject: Share how you use your modified 12-469 or 12-470
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
With my previous message seen below I have shared just one of the 
many practical ways you can use the modified Radio Shack 12-469 or 12-
470.  I think it might be interesting to see how others are using 
theirs.
I shared how I use my three 12-469 radios through a mixer, with white 
noise and into a laptop.  http://www.ufogeek.com/?p=108
How about anyone else? How are you using yours?
Let's get those ideas flowing!!! :-)

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" 
<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>
> I've completed my first audio test of my "Spiricomp" (not Spiricom) 
> setup.  It's three Radio Shack 12-469's, a mic, and white noise fed 
> into a mixer, then output into a laptop running audio capture 
> software.  I wrote more information, added a .wav file, and photos 
here 
> in case you're interested.  
> http://www.ufogeek.com/?p=108
> 
> Thanks!
> - Mike
>
